name: get_callback_url_status
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool weblasso.
Tool description: Scan the web for a diverse range of data including subdomains, IP Addresses, web technologies and emails!
API description: Check if a callback URL is able to receive scan results (ensure that the callback URL accepts POST requests).

callback_url.description: The URL to be checked for its ability to receive scan results.
